home.about.lead: with over 270 active companies across Catalonia’s main ports, organised in a structured digital directory and continuously growing.
home.about.p1: The platform classifies nautical services so you can find providers quickly, clearly and precisely.
home.about.p2: From technical maintenance and repairs to charter, marinas and specialised activities, it enables a direct connection between nautical professionals and users who need reliable solutions around their port.
home.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
home.faq.a1: NautiCards was created to solve how difficult it can be to find marine suppliers and workshops for boat owners and users. It is an open directory that groups companies by port and service, making it easier to search and access their website and contact details directly.
home.faq.q2: How do I find a company?
home.faq.a2: Go to the Search section and filter by port or by service type. The directory is designed to be useful both for boats moored in a port and for sailors in transit, and it also includes providers located outside port areas.
home.faq.q3: Is there any cost to appear on NautiCards?
home.faq.a3: NautiCards is a public directory whose mission is to provide as much information as possible to users. Listing companies and professionals is completely free, including profile management and image uploads.
home.faq.q4: How can I add my business?
home.faq.a4: To add your business, simply complete the registration form. With the company name and website, an initial profile is automatically created based on publicly available information. We recommend completing all fields and adding images to improve presentation and visibility.
search.empty: Select a port, a service, or type at least 3 characters to start searching.
